title: Towards a more individualised assessment of post-training fatigue in young footballers
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Adrien Mangini, Robin Macchi, Dorian Giraud, Laura Pomportes, Paul Galantine, Denis Bertin, Caroline Nicol, Arnaud Hays
